Multi-device synchronization function requirements
ICloud and notifications must be turned on
1: Turn on iCloud method: system settings-account-iCloud, turn on iCloud cloud disk and love reading switch
2: In IReading Shuxiang Settings-Backup & Restore, turn on the switches for automatic backup of books and automatic restoration of books
3: Turn on the notification function: system settings-notifications, allow love reading notifications
4: In order to reduce network traffic, by default, books will not be backed up and synchronized in real time, but will be backed up at an appropriate time. Go to Settings-Advanced Features-Network Core Settings and change the value of "Delayed Backup" to 1 second.
